rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that welcomes guests. Designed to adhere to Vastu principles with an inviting entry and proper flow of energy.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Large open space with floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side for natural light. The layout encourages cross ventilation in accordance with Vastu guidelines and modern aesthetics.

rooms.name: dining_room
rooms.description: A dining area adjoining the living room, optimized for social gatherings and designed for optimal light exposure.

rooms.name: home_theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater on the ground floor with acoustic treatments, ambient lighting, and an immersive design that respects natural light balance when not in use.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with ample storage and workspaces. The layout ensures proper ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles by positioning the stove in the southeast corner.

rooms.name: guest_bathroom
rooms.description: A guest bathroom located near the living area for convenience while maintaining privacy. Designed with proper ventilation and natural light where possible.

rooms.name: utility_room
rooms.description: Small utility room for laundry or storage of household items, strategically placed to avoid clutter in main living areas.

openings.description: A grand entrance door designed for maximum accessibility and natural light entry. Incorporates Vastu guidelines by facing a favorable direction.
Floor-to-ceiling balcony windows ensuring natural light and ventilation for the living room area.
Standard interior doors connecting rooms; designed to be unobtrusive yet functional for smooth flow between spaces.

rooms.name: master_bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and balcony. The room is oriented for maximum natural light and adheres to Vastu guidelines by avoiding the northwest direction.

rooms.name: master_bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom with high-end fixtures ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: bedroom_2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for family members, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on one side to maximize natural lighting and ventilation.

rooms.name: study_room
rooms.description: Dedicated study space with a view of the surroundings, incorporating modern design elements and natural light to boost productivity.

openings.description: Elegant staircase connecting the ground floor and first floor. Designed with safety and functionality in mind while complementing the overall colonial aesthetic.
Balconies on upper floors to allow cross ventilation and natural light exposure in the bedrooms and study room.
